review: The Fire TV Stick performs exactly as advertised.  Installation was straightforward and took less than 5 minutes.  Streaming video is seamless and the picture quality is excellent.  My only quibble is that many videos I wanted to watch (all of which are routinely available on basic HD cable) are available from Amazon only for a fee.  Disappointing.

review: Awesome - can't believe it does all this for such a low price.

review: Love it and have only had it for a week. Netflix and prime videos run smooth, Plays the music in my cloud, can view photos. Played with a few other apps and that works well too. Best part is I can take it with me when I leave NJ for Idaho next week and still enjoy everything. Great product.
